name: ChainShot
description:
Small Game made for the Mini Jame Gam #9

Fight off the endless hordes of lil log guys with your mighty Chainsaw!

Press 'Spacebar' to fire chainsaw

Assets used:

Big Grenade Explosion Sound Effect -  https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/

Pig Oink Grunt B Sound Effect - https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/

Its A Good Day - By Steve Oxen

Pinewood Font by Dieter Steffmann - https://www.fontspace.com/pinewood-font-f12324

Petrol Chainsaw by Rescue3D Game Assets - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/petrol-chainsaw-74889

LowPoly Vegetation Season Pack Lite by PolyMount - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vegetation/lowpoly-vegetation-season-pa...

FREE - Animated Angry Log - Revenge of the Tree by Beavy Store - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/creatures/free-animated-angr...
